alt.description: Check if a Blacket account is an alt.
alt.note: Leave the username blank for yourself.

blook.description: Get the into on a blook.
blook.note: Leave name blank for a random Blook.

blooks.description: Get the blooks of a user.
blooks.note: Leave the username blank for yourself.

booster.description: Get information about the current booster.

gamelb.description: Get everything you need from the leaderboard, without leaving chat.

missingblooks.description: Get the missing blooks of a user.
missingblooks.note: Leave the username blank for yourself.

net.description: Get the net worth of a user.
net.note: Leave the username blank for yourself.

pack.description: Get the info on a pack.
pack.note: Leave the pack name blank for a list.

user.description: Dig deep into a user's stats.
user.note: Leave the username blank for yourself.

level.description: Learn your XP amount from chatting.
level.note: Leave the user blank for yourself.

myprefix.note: This is YOUR prefix, and only works for you. / is a global prefix that works for everyone.

perm.description: <strike>show how important you are</strike> Show your permission level.
perm.note: Leave the username blank for yourself.

balance.description: Get a user's, or your, balance.
balance.note: Leave the username blank for yourself.

coinlb.description: Get the top 3 people with cash.

crime.description: Attempt to commit a crime - can you get away with the cash?

daily.description: Redeem daily coins in the bot!
daily.note: You can get between 135K and 165K with this command.

deposit.note: The bank is unrobbable. Always deposit.

friends.note: Run /friends for a list of subcommands.

inventory.description: Get a list of items you have.

item.description: Get the info on an item.

multis.note: There are a ton of subcommands. Run the command for more info.

withdraw.note: The pocket is robbable, but you must withdraw to spend or share.

8ball.description: Spin a magic 8 ball to answer your question.

claim.note: Nothing will be given to the claimer (lol)

coinflip.description: Flip a random coin to end a fight.

gay.description: Checks how gay a user is.
gay.note: Leave the user blank for yourself.

hack.note: This is fake, just like ban LMFAO

ip.note: Leave the username blank for yourself.

pp.note: Leave the username blank for yourself.

ship.description: See how well two users match.

random.description: Get a random string or number.
random.note: Run the command for more info.
